Comment: That’s oversimplifying it. People aren’t just programmed in their youth and then continue to behave according to those instructions forever. Education is important, but culture and media are also important.   If we’re going to encourage people to support liberal and progressive causes, we need to meet people where they are, not where they would have been if they were educated exactly the way we wish they had been.  I think we need to face the fact that we’ve become a post-literate society. Much is made of the fact that a large percentage of American adults are incapable of reading at above a primary school level, but possibly more concerning is that most of the adults who are capable of reading at an adult level simply do not bother to do so.
